attributes.action: Change McDonald’s breakfast closing time to noon.
attributes.additional_details: So I can have McDonalds breakfast more often.
attributes.background: Demand McDonalds to change their times.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about when to serve particular menu items are a matter for individual food and drink venues, not the UK Government or Parliament.
